languages.text: {n}Эмелина Лихтенхарт склоняет голову.{/n} "Фон Валанциус, династия Вольных Торговцев, регион к галактическому западу от Фурибундуса, главствующая Теодора фон Валанциус замечена в еретических настроениях, уровень угрозы..."

{n}Emelina Lichtenhart dips her head.{/n} "Von Valancius. A Rogue Trader dynasty. Territory to the galactic west of Furibundus. The head of the dynasty, Theodora von Valancius, has been flagged for her heretical sentiments. Threat level—"

languages.text: {n}艾米莉娜·莱肯哈特垂下了头。{/n}“冯·瓦兰修斯，行商浪人王朝，其领地位于怒焰星西部。王朝首领为西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯，以异端倾向著称。威胁等级——”
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina Lichtenhart dips her head.{/n} "Von Valancius. A Rogue Trader dynasty. Territory to the galactic west of Furibundus. The head of the dynasty, Theodora von Valancius, has been flagged for her heretical sentiments. Threat level—"

traits.locale_text: {n}艾米莉娜·莱肯哈特垂下了头。{/n}“冯·瓦兰修斯，行商浪人王朝，其领地位于怒焰星西部。王朝首领为西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯，以异端倾向著称。威胁等级——”
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}Emelina Lichtenhart agacha la cabeza.{/n} «Von Valancius. Una dinastía de Comerciantes Independientes. Territorio al oeste galáctico de Furibundus. La dirigente de la dinastía, Theodora von Valancius, está señalada por sus inclinaciones heréticas. Nivel de amenaza...».
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina Lichtenhart dips her head.{/n} "Von Valancius. A Rogue Trader dynasty. Territory to the galactic west of Furibundus. The head of the dynasty, Theodora von Valancius, has been flagged for her heretical sentiments. Threat level—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Emelina Lichtenhart agacha la cabeza.{/n} «Von Valancius. Una dinastía de Comerciantes Independientes. Territorio al oeste galáctico de Furibundus. La dirigente de la dinastía, Theodora von Valancius, está señalada por sus inclinaciones heréticas. Nivel de amenaza...».
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}エメリナ・リヒテンハルトは頭を下げる。{/n}「フォン・ヴァランシウス。自由開拓者王朝。フリブンダスの銀河系西の領土。王朝の長、シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスは異端の感情を持っているとしてフラグを立てられている。脅威レベル―」
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina Lichtenhart dips her head.{/n} "Von Valancius. A Rogue Trader dynasty. Territory to the galactic west of Furibundus. The head of the dynasty, Theodora von Valancius, has been flagged for her heretical sentiments. Threat level—"

traits.locale_text: {n}エメリナ・リヒテンハルトは頭を下げる。{/n}「フォン・ヴァランシウス。自由開拓者王朝。フリブンダスの銀河系西の領土。王朝の長、シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスは異端の感情を持っているとしてフラグを立てられている。脅威レベル―」
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}Emelina Lichtenhart baisse la tête.{/n} « Von Valancius. Une dynastie de libres-marchands occupant un territoire à l'ouest galactique de Furibundus. L'attention de l'Inquisition a été attirée sur les penchants hérétiques de sa dirigeante, Théodora von Valancius. Niveau de menace... »
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina Lichtenhart dips her head.{/n} "Von Valancius. A Rogue Trader dynasty. Territory to the galactic west of Furibundus. The head of the dynasty, Theodora von Valancius, has been flagged for her heretical sentiments. Threat level—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Emelina Lichtenhart baisse la tête.{/n} « Von Valancius. Une dynastie de libres-marchands occupant un territoire à l'ouest galactique de Furibundus. L'attention de l'Inquisition a été attirée sur les penchants hérétiques de sa dirigeante, Théodora von Valancius. Niveau de menace... »
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}Emelina Lichtenhart senkt den Kopf.{/n} "Von Valancius. Eine Freihändlerdynastie. Territorium im galaktischen Westen von Furibundus. Das Oberhaupt der Dynastie, Theodora von Valancius, wurde wegen ketzerischer Haltungen markiert. Bedrohungsstufe ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina Lichtenhart dips her head.{/n} "Von Valancius. A Rogue Trader dynasty. Territory to the galactic west of Furibundus. The head of the dynasty, Theodora von Valancius, has been flagged for her heretical sentiments. Threat level—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Emelina Lichtenhart senkt den Kopf.{/n} "Von Valancius. Eine Freihändlerdynastie. Territorium im galaktischen Westen von Furibundus. Das Oberhaupt der Dynastie, Theodora von Valancius, wurde wegen ketzerischer Haltungen markiert. Bedrohungsstufe ..."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}Emelina Lichtenhart'ın başı eğiliyor.{/n} "Von Valancius. Hür Tacir hanedanlığı. Furibundus galaktik batısı bölgesi. Hanedanlığın başı Theodora von Valancius, kayıtlarda kâfirce düşünceleriyle geçiyor. Tehdit seviyesi..."
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina Lichtenhart dips her head.{/n} "Von Valancius. A Rogue Trader dynasty. Territory to the galactic west of Furibundus. The head of the dynasty, Theodora von Valancius, has been flagged for her heretical sentiments. Threat level—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Emelina Lichtenhart'ın başı eğiliyor.{/n} "Von Valancius. Bir Hür Tacir hanedanlığı. Furibundus galaktik batısı bölgesi. Hanedanlığın başı Theodora von Valancius, kayıtlarda kâfirce düşünceleriyle yer alıyor. Tehdit seviyesi..."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina
